entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Local smoke this evening. Fog patches overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local smoke in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
